thread.title: Carter Nelson
thread.title_full: Lucky Tackle Box reviewed by Carter Nelson

author: Carter Nelson
title: Carter Nelson
text: I have just recently ordered a box but forgot to enter a promo code, I asked their customer service if they could help me out and throw in a extra Live Target lure for me, they responded quickly and professionally, I would like to shout out to Mel for helping me and being so kind, I hope you get two high fives!
